verses.kjv: These are the statutes and judgments, which ye shall observe to do in the land, which the LORD God of thy fathers giveth thee to possess it, all the days that ye live upon the earth.
verses.ct: These are the rules and regulations you must carefully follow in the land that the LORD, the God of your ancestors, is giving you to possess — for as long as you live on the earth.

verses.kjv: Ye shall utterly destroy all the places, wherein the nations which ye shall possess served their gods, upon the high mountains, and upon the hills, and under every green tree:
verses.ct: You must completely destroy every place where the nations you are displacing worshiped their gods — on the high mountains, on the hills, and under every leafy tree.

verses.kjv: And ye shall overthrow their altars, and break their pillars, and burn their groves with fire; and ye shall hew down the graven images of their gods, and destroy the names of them out of that place.
verses.ct: Tear down their altars, smash their sacred pillars, burn their worship poles, and chop down the carved images of their gods. Wipe out every trace of their names from those places.

verses.kjv: Ye shall not do so unto the LORD your God.
verses.ct: You must not worship the LORD your God in the way they worshiped their gods.

verses.kjv: But unto the place which the LORD your God shall choose out of all your tribes to put his name there, even unto his habitation shall ye seek, and thither thou shalt come:
verses.ct: Instead, seek out the place the LORD your God will choose from among all your tribes to establish his name. Go to that dwelling place.

verses.kjv: And thither ye shall bring your burnt offerings, and your sacrifices, and your tithes, and heave offerings of your hand, and your vows, and your freewill offerings, and the firstlings of your herds and of your flocks:
verses.ct: Bring your burnt offerings, your sacrifices, your tithes, your special contributions, your offerings made in fulfillment of vows, your voluntary offerings, and the firstborn of your herds and flocks there.

verses.kjv: And there ye shall eat before the LORD your God, and ye shall rejoice in all that ye put your hand unto, ye and your households, wherein the LORD thy God hath blessed thee.
verses.ct: There, in the presence of the LORD your God, you and your families will eat and celebrate everything you have worked for, because the LORD your God has blessed you.

verses.kjv: Ye shall not do after all the things that we do here this day, every man whatsoever is right in his own eyes.
verses.ct: You must stop doing what we are doing now, where everyone simply does whatever seems right to them.

verses.kjv: For ye are not as yet come to the rest and to the inheritance, which the LORD your God giveth you.
verses.ct: You haven't yet reached the place of rest and the inheritance that the LORD your God is giving you.

verses.kjv: But when ye go over Jordan, and dwell in the land which the LORD your God giveth you to inherit, and when he giveth you rest from all your enemies round about, so that ye dwell in safety;
verses.ct: But once you cross the Jordan and settle in the land the LORD your God is giving you as your inheritance, and once he gives you relief from all the enemies surrounding you so that you live in safety —

verses.kjv: Then there shall be a place which the LORD your God shall choose to cause his name to dwell there; thither shall ye bring all that I command you; your burnt offerings, and your sacrifices, your tithes, and the heave offering of your hand, and all your choice vows which ye vow unto the LORD:
verses.ct: then the LORD your God will choose a specific place where his name will dwell. That is where you must bring everything I am commanding you: your burnt offerings, your sacrifices, your tithes, your special contributions, and all the best offerings you have vowed to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And ye shall rejoice before the LORD your God, ye, and your sons, and your daughters, and your menservants, and your maidservants, and the Levite that is within your gates; forasmuch as he hath no part nor inheritance with you.
verses.ct: Celebrate in the presence of the LORD your God — you, your sons, your daughters, your male and female servants, and the Levites living in your towns, since the Levites have no land allotment or inheritance among you.

verses.kjv: Take heed to thyself that thou offer not thy burnt offerings in every place that thou seest:
verses.ct: Be careful not to offer your burnt offerings just anywhere you please.

verses.kjv: But in the place which the LORD shall choose in one of thy tribes, there thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings, and there thou shalt do all that I command thee.
verses.ct: Only at the place the LORD chooses within one of your tribal territories — that is where you must offer your burnt offerings and carry out everything I am commanding you.

verses.kjv: Notwithstanding thou mayest kill and eat flesh in all thy gates, whatsoever thy soul lusteth after, according to the blessing of the LORD thy God which he hath given thee: the unclean and the clean may eat thereof, as of the roebuck, and as of the hart.
verses.ct: However, you may slaughter and eat meat in any of your towns whenever you want, according to the blessing the LORD your God has given you. Both those who are ritually clean and those who are unclean may eat it, just as you would eat gazelle or deer.

verses.kjv: Only ye shall not eat the blood; ye shall pour it upon the earth as water.
verses.ct: But you must never eat the blood. Pour it out on the ground like water.

verses.kjv: Thou mayest not eat within thy gates the tithe of thy corn, or of thy wine, or of thy oil, or the firstlings of thy herds or of thy flock, nor any of thy vows which thou vowest, nor thy freewill offerings, or heave offering of thine hand:
verses.ct: You are not allowed to eat the following within your own towns: the tithe of your grain, new wine, or olive oil; the firstborn of your herds or flocks; any offerings you have vowed; your voluntary offerings; or your special contributions.

verses.kjv: But thou must eat them before the LORD thy God in the place which the LORD thy God shall choose, thou, and thy son, and thy daughter, and thy manservant, and thy maidservant, and the Levite that is within thy gates: and thou shalt rejoice before the LORD thy God in all that thou puttest thine hands unto.
verses.ct: Instead, you must eat these in the presence of the LORD your God at the place the LORD your God chooses — you, your sons, your daughters, your male and female servants, and the Levites living in your towns. Celebrate in the presence of the LORD your God over everything you have put your hands to.

verses.kjv: Take heed to thyself that thou forsake not the Levite as long as thou livest upon the earth.
verses.ct: Be careful never to neglect the Levites for as long as you live in your land.

verses.kjv: When the LORD thy God shall enlarge thy border, as he hath promised thee, and thou shalt say, I will eat flesh, because thy soul longeth to eat flesh; thou mayest eat flesh, whatsoever thy soul lusteth after.
verses.ct: When the LORD your God expands your territory as he promised you, and you say, 'I'd like to eat some meat,' because you have a craving for it, then you may eat meat whenever you want.

verses.kjv: If the place which the LORD thy God hath chosen to put his name there be too far from thee, then thou shalt kill of thy herd and of thy flock, which the LORD hath given thee, as I have commanded thee, and thou shalt eat in thy gates whatsoever thy soul lusteth after.
verses.ct: If the place the LORD your God has chosen to establish his name is too far away from you, then you may slaughter animals from your herds and flocks that the LORD has given you, just as I have instructed you, and eat the meat in your own towns whenever you want.

verses.kjv: Even as the roebuck and the hart is eaten, so thou shalt eat them: the unclean and the clean shall eat of them alike.
verses.ct: Eat it the same way you would eat gazelle or deer — both the ritually unclean and the clean may eat it together.

verses.kjv: Only be sure that thou eat not the blood: for the blood is the life; and thou mayest not eat the life with the flesh.
verses.ct: Just be absolutely sure you do not eat the blood, because the blood represents the life, and you must not consume the life along with the meat.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt not eat it; thou shalt pour it upon the earth as water.
verses.ct: Do not eat it. Pour it out on the ground like water.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt not eat it; that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee, when thou shalt do that which is right in the sight of the LORD.
verses.ct: Do not eat it, so that things will go well for you and your descendants after you, because you will be doing what is right in the LORD's sight.

verses.kjv: Only thy holy things which thou hast, and thy vows, thou shalt take, and go unto the place which the LORD shall choose:
verses.ct: But take your sacred offerings and your vow offerings and go to the place the LORD will choose.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings, the flesh and the blood, upon the altar of the LORD thy God: and the blood of thy sacrifices shall be poured out upon the altar of the LORD thy God, and thou shalt eat the flesh.
verses.ct: Present your burnt offerings — both the meat and the blood — on the altar of the LORD your God. The blood of your sacrifices must be poured out beside the altar of the LORD your God, and then you may eat the meat.

verses.kjv: Observe and hear all these words which I command thee, that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee for ever, when thou doest that which is good and right in the sight of the LORD thy God.
verses.ct: Pay close attention to all these instructions I am giving you, and obey them, so that things will always go well for you and your descendants after you, because you will be doing what is good and right in the sight of the LORD your God.

verses.kjv: When the LORD thy God shall cut off the nations from before thee, whither thou goest to possess them, and thou succeedest them, and dwellest in their land;
verses.ct: When the LORD your God eliminates the nations ahead of you as you go in to take their land, and after you have displaced them and settled in their territory —

verses.kjv: Take heed to thyself that thou be not snared by following them, after that they be destroyed from before thee; and that thou enquire not after their gods, saying, How did these nations serve their gods? even so will I do likewise.
verses.ct: be careful not to fall into their trap by imitating them after they have been destroyed ahead of you. Do not go looking into their gods, asking, 'How did these nations worship their gods? I want to do the same thing.'

verses.kjv: Thou shalt not do so unto the LORD thy God: for every abomination to the LORD, which he hateth, have they done unto their gods; for even their sons and their daughters they have burnt in the fire to their gods.
verses.ct: You must never worship the LORD your God that way, because they did every disgusting thing the LORD despises when they worshiped their gods — they even burned their own sons and daughters as sacrifices to their gods.

verses.kjv: What thing soever I command you, observe to do it: thou shalt not add thereto, nor diminish from it.
verses.ct: Everything I am commanding you, be careful to follow it. Do not add anything to it, and do not take anything away from it.
